title: Ep. 72 - How To Make Money in Small-Cap Stocks
itunes:title: How To Make Money in Small-Cap Stocks
description: Lou Basenese, small-cap analyst at White Cap Research, shares his top picks. Rich Suttmeier, chief market strategist at Valuengine.com, predicts 1,200 small-cap bank failures.
